description:
Grow a greener lawn

Core Seagreen is a deep greening fertilizer designed for sustained growth and long-term resilience.

With its quick- and slow-release nitrogen formulation, our upgraded fertilizer provides immediate greening and up to 45 days of continuous, controlled growth. Formulated with carefully selected ingredients like kelp, corn gluten meal, iron, and gypsum, it increases your lawn's tolerance to stress, improves nutrient uptake, and boosts overall resilience.

A Sunday premium selection

Enriched with potent nutrients and unique soil enhancers, our premium fertilizers outperform standard options for superior, long-lasting lawn health.

sections.product_fetaures:
24-0-4 NPK (Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) premium granular fertilizer
Provides up to 45 days of sustained growth
Quick greenup—powered by iron and kelp
Improves lawn resilience and nutrient uptake
Formulated without pesticides
Suitable for all common grass types
Includes (1) 12 lbs. bag of granular fertilizer—spreader required
sections.ingredients:
Uncoated urea (nitrogen) for quick nitrogen uptake
Slow-release nitrogen for sustained growth
Iron for deep greening
Potassium for plant health, stress tolerance, and improved nutrient uptake
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply early morning or late evening to a well-hydrated lawn in the spring or fall.
Set your spreader to the correct setting.
Apply evenly across the lawn. Recommended rate is 3 lbs./1000 sq. ft.
Sweep up any product that gets onto sidewalks or other hardscapes back onto the lawn or into the bag.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How is Sunday granular fertilizer different from traditional fertilizers?
Most granular fertilizers stop at nutrition. Sunday granulated are the complete care package. Our formulas combine slow-release nutrients with soil-building ingredients and specialized formulations (with surfactant or kelp) that help your lawn stay resilient during summer heatwaves.
What grasses can I apply granular fertilizer on?
Sunday’s granular fertilizer works for all residential turfgrasses. We don’t recommend applying to centipedegrass more than twice per year, and it’s not formulated for golf course grasses like colonial bentgrass or creeping bentgrass.
When to water after granular fertilizer
Watering in granular fertilizer immediately after application helps ensure the nutrients reach the soil and the grass’s root zone, avoiding any potential lawn burn. Plus, it reduces granule movement.
Can I use granular fertilizer with liquid lawn fertilizer?
We don’t recommend using granular fertilizer alongside other fertilizers, including Sunday liquid fertilizers. Wait 6 weeks after applying granular fertilizer before applying liquid lawn fertilizer for best results.
How much lawn fertilizer will I need?
Each bag covers 4,000 sq. ft. Application based on yard size:
1,000–2,000 sq. ft.: 1/2 bag
2,000–4,000 sq. ft.: 1 bag
4,000–6,000 sq. ft.: 1 ½ bags
6,000-8,000 sq. ft.: 2 bags
8,000-10,000 sq. ft.: 2 ½ bags
10,000-12,000 sq. ft.: 3 bags
When is it safe for people and pets to go on my lawn after applying?
Our ingredients break down quickly and don’t persist in the environment. Once the product is watered in and your lawn dries, it’s safe for people and pets to resume activities!
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all states.
Granular Lawn Fertilizer Instructions
Our dry granular lawn fertilizers are formulated for long-lasting growth and easy application. Learn how to apply granular lawn fertilizer correctly and get expert tips for your greenest lawn yet.
